title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1
headline_credit: United Kingdom and United States of America, 2010
brief_description: Harry, Ron and Hermione walk away from their last year at Hogwarts to find and destroy the remaining Horcruxes, putting an end to Voldemort’s bid for immortality. But with Voldemort’s Death Eaters on the loose, the world is more dangerous than ever.

constellations_other.name: Reflecting duality and revealing new realities
constellations_other.description: The Toupie Fantoche relies on four prismatic mirrors to reflect changes in animation states.

constellations_other.name: Shadowplay and spookiness
constellations_other.description: Silhouettes and shadows scare up some of the most sinister creatures in cinema and videogames.

title_for_label: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1
headline_credit_for_label: United Kingdom and United States of America, 2010
description: Harry, Ron and Hermione walk away from their last year at Hogwarts to find and destroy the remaining Horcruxes, putting an end to Voldemort’s bid for immortality. But with Harry’s beloved Dumbledore dead and Voldemort’s unscrupulous Death Eaters on the loose, the world is more dangerous than ever.
description_for_label: Harry, Ron and Hermione walk away from their last year at Hogwarts to find and destroy the remaining Horcruxes, putting an end to Voldemort’s bid for immortality. But with Harry’s beloved Dumbledore dead and Voldemort’s unscrupulous Death Eaters on the loose, the world is more dangerous than ever.
